OrganizationTemplates.title: Organization templates
OrganizationTemplates.description: Manage or create DMSP templates, once published researchers will be able to select your template.
OrganizationTemplates.searchHelpText: Search by research organization, field station or lab, template description, etc.
OrganizationTemplates.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong while retrieving templates

EditTemplates.title: Edit template
EditTemplates.allowAccess: Allow people to access, edit or comment on this plan

description.archiveTemplate: This template will no longer be visible to plan creators. Pre-existing plans that use this template will be unaffected. This is not reversible.

errors.displayOrderAlreadyAtTop: Section is already at top of order
errors.cannotMoveFurtherUpOrDown: Cannot move section further up or down

radioBtn.publicHelpText: This template can be used by all plan writers.
radioBtn.orgOnlyHelpText: Only plan writers from your organization will be able to view and use this template.

PublishTemplate.descPublishedTemplate: You can control who can use this published template.

bullet.publishingTemplate: After publication, all new plans will use this version.
bullet.publishingTemplate2: In-progress or existing plans will not be updated.
bullet.publishingTemplate3: You have configured Visibility as Public in Template options. All DMP Tool users will be able to see and use this template.
bullet.publishingTemplate3Private: You have configured Visibility as Private in Template options. Only DMP Tool users within your organization will be able to see and use this template.

PublishTemplate.descChangeLog: Enter a short description of what has been changed. This will only be visible to people in your organization.

errors.displayOrderAlreadyAtTop: Question is already at top of order
errors.cannotMoveFurtherUpOrDown: Cannot move question further up or down

headings.previouslyCreatedSections: Use one of your previously created sections
headings.bestPracticeSections: Use a best practice section created by DMP Tool

search.label: Search by keyword
search.helpText: Search by section name, description, etc.

SectionTypeSelectPage.intro: You have three options. You can use a section you created previously, use a DMP Tool best practice section or build a new section. All sections are customizable once selected.
SectionTypeSelectPage.newSectionDescription: Build a new section from scratch. You can add questions, instructions, and other content to your section, we highly recommend using the best practice sections.

helpText.bestPracticeTagsDesc: Select one or more tags to associate global best practice guidance written by DMP Tool.
helpText.sectionIntroduction: Enter a short, concise introduction to the section.
helpText.sectionRequirements: Outline the requirements that a user must consider in this section.
helpText.sectionGuidance: Provide users with helpful guidance to help them answer the questions in the section.

messages.fieldLengthValidation: Name must be at least 2 characters.
Name must be at least 2 characters.

deleteModal.title: Delete section
deleteModal.content: Deleting this section will also permanently remove all associated questions. Deletion is not reversible.

deleteSection.heading: Delete this section
deleteSection.description: Deleting this section will also permanently remove all associated questions. Deletion is not reversible.

QuestionTypeSelectPage.title: What type of question would you like to add?
QuestionTypeSelectPage.description: As you create your template, you can choose different types of questions to add to it, depending on the type of information you require from the plan creator.
QuestionTypeSelectPage.searchHelpText: Search by field type or description.

TemplateCreatePage.helpText: Don't worry, you can change this later.

messages.templateNameError: Please enter a valid value for template name.

TemplateSelectTemplatePage.title: Start with a copy of an existing template

messages.loadingError: Error loading templates. Please try again later.

messages.additionalGuidance: Your research organization has additional guidance

descriptions.sampleText: Provide an example or template of expected answer (optional but recommended)
descriptions.sampleTextAsDefault: Have this answer entered into the DMP by default
descriptions.previewText: See how this question will look to users.
descriptions.bestPracticePara1: Keep the Question short so it can be used as a heading in the final DMP.
descriptions.bestPracticePara2: Use the Requirements to add more detailed instructions to the question, making sure to include all instructions for what needs to be answered in the question.
descriptions.bestPracticePara3: Use Guidance to add advice on how to come up with responses to the Question. Keep it concise and specific so they can get the information they need to respond to the question. You can add links to outside resources for longer policy documents that won't show up as well in the tool.
descriptions.deleteWarning: This question will be removed from the template. This is not reversible.

helpText.textField: Changing the question type, for example from Text Field to Radio Buttons, may result in some data being lost.
helpText.questionOptions: Please enter answer choices for the {questionType}
helpText.questionText: Keep the question text concise and clear. Use the requirements or guidance to provide additional explanation.
helpText.requirementText: Use this for specific instructions on what researchers are required to include in their answer, such as what properties of their data they should be listing.
helpText.guidanceText: Let researchers know how to best provide answers to the requirements, such as policies to consider from your organization or what factors to consider.
helpText.sampleText: Plan creators will be able to copy the sample text into the field as a starting point, to speed up content entry.

researchOutput.description: Select which standard fields to include in your research output question. You can customize each field individually.

tooltip.requiredFields: These fields are required for all research outputs.

TemplateAccessPage.title: Manage access
TemplateAccessPage.intro: This template is editable by everyone at {orgName}. It can also be shared with people outside your organization to allow them edit access.

headings.share: Share with someone outside your organization

paragraphs.orgAccessPara1: Everyone at {name} can view and edit
paragraphs.sharePara1: Enter their email address. If they do not already have a DMP Tool account they will be prompted to create one.
paragraphs.modalPara1: Please confirm that you want to remove {email}

info.noCollaborators: No external people have been added yet
